events.text: You can't help but breathe in the acrid stench of this flower...

“You who pass over this bridge, go not yonder. There crime fraternises with vice." 
"One day his friends awaited in vain a young man who crossed that fatal threshold.”
"Curiosity was stronger than fear."
[color=#38f5bc]Les Chants de Maldoror,[/color] [color=#ff0000]Comte De Latreaumont (1868)[/color]
